com.bigdata.rdf.sparql.ast.eval

Class ASTSearchOptimizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.rdf.sparql.ast.eval.ASTSearchOptimizerBase
      • com.bigdata.rdf.sparql.ast.eval.ASTSearchOptimizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IASTOptimizer

    public class ASTSearchOptimizer
extends ASTSearchOptimizerBase
    Translate BDS.SEARCH and related magic predicates into a ServiceNode which will invoke the bigdata search engine. 
     with {
    select ?subj ?score
    where {
      ?lit bds:search "foo" .
      ?lit bds:relevance ?score .
      ?subj ?p ?lit .
    }
   ORDER BY DESC(?score)
   LIMIT 10
   OFFSET 0 
 } as %searchSet1
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson, Michael Schmidt
